machine_start_gcode.default_value:
M140 S55.00                           ; Set Bed Temperature (Fast) to 55C
M104 T0 S{material_print_temperature} ; Set 0 Extruder Temperature to material temperature and continue immediately
M104 T1 S{material_print_temperature} ; Set 1 Extruder Temperature to material temperature and continue immediately
M109 T0 S{material_print_temperature} ; Set 0 Extruder Temperature to material temperature , target extruder 0 and wait 
M109 T1 S{material_print_temperature} ; Set 1 Extruder Temperature to material temperature , target extruder 0 and wait 
T0                                    ; Select tool 0
M190 S{material_bed_temperature}      ; Wait for bed temperature to reach target temp, 55C
M572 D0 S0.09                         ; Set or report extruder pressure advance, Extruder 0, Pressure advance amount 0.09s
M572 D1 S0.09                         ; Set or report extruder pressure advance, Extruder 1, Pressure advance amount 0.09s
G21                                   ; Set Units to Millimeters
G90                                   ; Set to Absolute Positioning
M82                                   ; Set extruder to absolute mode
M107                                  ; Fan Off (which fan?)
G28                                   ; Return to home 
G1 Z0 F{speed_travel}                 ; Linear Move to Z=0
T0                                    ; Select tool 0
G92 E0                                ; Program absolute extruder position to 0
G1 X30 Y-2 F800                       ; Linear Move
G1 Z0.35 F200                         ; Linear Move
G1 X85 Y-2 E13 F200                   ; Linear Move, extrude filament
G1 E15 F200                           ; Linear Move, extrude filament
G1 Z5 F200                            ; Linear Move; 
G92 E0                                ; Program absolute extruder position to 0
G0 E-{retraction_amount} F200         ; retract
T1                                    ; Select tool 1
G92 E0                                ; Program absolute extruder position to 0
G1 X210 Y-2 F800                      ; Linear Move
G1 Z0.35 F200                         ; Linear Move
G1 X275 Y-2 E13 F200                  ; Linear Move, extrude filament
G1 E15 F200                           ; Linear Move, extrude filament
G1 Z5 F200                            ; Linear Move
G92 E0                                ; Program absolute extruder position to 0
G0 E-{retraction_amount} F200         ; retract
T0                                    ; Select tool 0
G1 F{speed_travel}                    ; set speed linear move
M117 Printing...                      ; print statement
M1001                                 ; End of Start GCode

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
M1002                            ; Beginning of End GCode.
M104 T0 S0                       ; Set Extruder Temperature to 0, target extruder 0
M104 T1 S0                       ; Set Extruder Temperature to 0, target extruder 1
M221 T0 S100                     ; Set extrude factor override percentage, extruder 0, extrude override factor 100%
M221 T1 S100                     ; Set extrude factor override percentage, extruder 0, extrude override factor 100%
M104 S0                          ; Set Extruder Temperature to 0C
M140 S0                          ; Set Bed Temperature (Fast) to 0C
M117 Print Complete.             ; Display Message "Print Complete."
M106 P2 S0                       ; Turn chamber cooling fan to 0
M107                             ; Fan Off
G91                              ; Set to Relative Positioning
G1 E-1 F300                      ; Retract 1 mm 
G1 Z+0.5 E-5 Y-20 F{speed_travel}; Linear Move .5 mm up, retract 5mm 
G28 X0 Y0                        ; Return to home 
M84                              ; Stop idle hold, disable steppers until next move 
G90                              ; Set to Absolute Positioning
